farmDetails.title: Tell Us About Your Farm
farmDetails.subtitle: Help us understand your farming conditions for personalized crop recommendations

sandy.name: Sandy
sandy.description: Well-draining, quick to warm up, low water retention

clay.name: Clay
clay.description: Heavy, nutrient-rich, slow drainage, retains water well

loamy.name: Loamy
loamy.description: Perfect balance of sand, silt, and clay - ideal for most crops

silty.name: Silty
silty.description: Fine particles, good water retention, fertile

peaty.name: Peaty
peaty.description: High organic matter, acidic, excellent water retention

chalky.name: Chalky
chalky.description: Alkaline, free-draining, may need pH adjustment

saline.name: Saline
saline.description: High salt content, challenging for most crops

black_cotton.name: Black Cotton
black_cotton.description: Rich in clay, swells when wet, cracks when dry
